projects.title: Property Price Prediction Tool
projects.bodyText: - Developed an interactive interface using Jupyter to predict the selling price with an **RMSE = 0.71**

projects.title: Job recommender system for Craigslist
projects.bodyText: - Analyzed resume and job descriptions using BERT and k- means to attain an accuracy of **76%**

projects.title: Phishing mail classifier
projects.bodyText: - Used NLP techniques to vectorize the body of the mail and developed a DNN model to classify a phishing mail with an accuracy of **95.9%**

projects.title: Credit default Prediction
projects.bodyText: - Developed a classification model to predict the default probability of the customers based on their historical behavior and obtained an **AUC â‰ˆ 0.75**

projects.title: Resource usage forecasting and Cost optimization
projects.bodyText: - Forecasted the water usage of the company in forthcoming 4 weeks and determined best water sourcing strategy to reduce the total water cost to the company there by saving **$60k** per annum
